留言內容: I really like the pattern of this shirt, that is what drew me to it in the first place. Upon receiving it, I immediately noticed how sheer it was, which I personally don't love, because I work in a school district and can't be walking around with a see through shirt on. However, a tank top will easily fix this problem, so I'm not too concerned with this. I am 7 months Postpartum and things aren't fitting as they once did and this shirt does cling in some non flattering areas, but I am on a weight loss journey, so I will keep it, with the hope of it fitting in the upcoming summer months. I wore it today and received lots of compliments on how I styled it, (jeans, thin black turtleneck, black vans and chunk gold jewelry.) I just personally was hoping for a shirt with more of a cotton feel, versus the stretchy polyester feel that this one has.
